channel.title: Help starting server
channel.description:
Whenever i try to run my server i always get this error. [code][1/27/11 1:32 PM]: Launching Rune Vortex... [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: java.net.BindEx ception: Address already in use: bind [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [1/27/11 1:32 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I have utorrent on the right port and my no-ip is working fine

@fly493 wrote:

I did what you said and then I got an error on uTorrent

Listen Error You should change the listen port.

item.title: Help starting server
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

X out uTorrent, run your server, then open uTorrent.

Ffs man, read the error.

“Address already in use: bind”
